verses.verse: Come, <S%H1980><s%> and let us <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> hath <S%H2963>torn,<s%> and he will <S%H7495>heal<s%> us; he hath <S%H5221>smitten,<s%> and he will bind us <S%H2280>up.<s%>

After two <S%H4480>days<s%> <S%H3117><s%> will he <S%H2421>revive<s%> us: in the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> he will raise us <S%H6965>up,<s%> and we shall <S%H2421>live<s%> in his <S%H6440>sight.<s%>

Then shall we <S%H3045>know,<s%> if we follow <S%H7291>on<s%> to <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> his going <S%H4161>forth<s%> is <S%H3559>prepared<s%> as the <S%H7837>morning;<s%> and he shall <S%H935>come<s%> unto us as the <S%H1653>rain,<s%> as the <S%H4456>latter<s%> and former <S%H3138>rain<s%> unto the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

O <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> shall I <S%H6213>do<s%> unto thee? O <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> shall I <S%H6213>do<s%> unto thee? for your <S%H2617>goodness<s%> is as a <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H6051>cloud,<s%> and as the <S%H7925>early<s%> <S%H2919>dew<s%> it goeth <S%H1980>away.<s%>

Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> have I <S%H2672>hewed<s%> them by the <S%H5030>prophets;<s%> I have <S%H2026>slain<s%> them by the <S%H561>words<s%> of my <S%H6310>mouth:<s%> and thy <S%H4941>judgments<s%> are as the <S%H216>light<s%> that goeth <S%H3318>forth.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H2654>desired<s%> <S%H2617>mercy,<s%> and <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifice;<s%> and the <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> more than burnt <S%H4480>offerings.<s%> <S%H5930><s%>
But <S%H1992>they<s%> like <S%H120>men<s%> have <S%H5674>transgressed<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant:<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> have they dealt <S%H898>treacherously<s%> against me.
Gilead <S%H1568><s%> is a <S%H7151>city<s%> of them that <S%H6466>work<s%> <S%H205>iniquity,<s%> and is <S%H6121>polluted<s%> with <S%H4480>blood.<s%> <S%H1818><s%>

And as troops of <S%H1416>robbers<s%> <S%H2442>wait<s%> for a <S%H376>man,<s%> so the <S%H2267>company<s%> of <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H7523>murder<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> by <S%H7926>consent:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> they <S%H6213>commit<s%> <S%H2154>lewdness.<s%>

I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> a horrible <S%H8186>thing<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> is the <S%H2184>whoredom<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is <S%H2930>defiled.<s%>
Also, <S%H1571><s%> O <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> he hath <S%H7896>set<s%> a <S%H7105>harvest<s%> for thee, when I <S%H7725>returned<s%> the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of my <S%H5971>people.<s%>
